If you're not familiar with the history of nuclear testing, you will likely have to pick up your jaw at the sheer amount of nuclear tests done in 53 years time.

Incidentally, my first post after finally registering. Hurray!

That's the thing I love about the Cold War. The Soviets nuked themselves 715 times, the USA nuked themselves 1032 times, yet not a shot fired between the two.

Yeah, well done guys.

Yeah, well done guys.

Indeed. I applaud the foreign ministers on both sides. Well, the leaders too, but to a lesser extent : )
If we managed to survive this bout of suicidal insanity, i think we will keep ourselves alive in the foreseeable future. Yay for survival instinct
